definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事务所的时候，就会去芝加哥大学讲课。

sentences.english: In 1983, the Sociology Department at Chicago offered me a joint appointment.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，芝加哥大学社会学系给我一份邀请。

sentences.english: Quarterly. 1932- , American Society of Church History.
sentences.chinese: 美国宗教史协会，芝加哥大学。

sentences.english: After my third year of graduate study I became an Assistant Professor at Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 在研究生的第三年，我成为了芝加哥大学的助教授。

sentences.english: The intellectual heart of this philosophy is here at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 这一哲学思想的核心是在此间召开的芝加哥大学。

sentences.english: He was a member of the University of Chicago championship basketball team in nineteen-oh-nine.
sentences.chinese: 他是1909年芝加哥大学冠军赛篮球队的队员。

sentences.english: Researchers interviewed more than 8,000 hospitalized patients at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员在芝加哥大学调查了8000多位住院病人。

sentences.english: Mr. Wolfowitz has a doctorate in political science from the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔福威茨先生拥有芝加哥大学政治学博士学位。

sentences.english: She is a postgraduate at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 她是芝加哥大学的一名研究生。

sentences.english: At the University of Chicago there aren't a lot of jobs for lexicographers.
sentences.chinese: 在芝加哥大学，词典编纂者并没有很多的工作。

sentences.english: The University of Chicago estimates that a year's study will cost $56, 640.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥大学一年的学习费用是56460美元。

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Da2 te4 mao2 si1 Xue2 yuan4

definition: California Institute of Technology (Caltech)/abbr. for 加利福尼亞理工學院|加利福尼亚理工学院

Huo4 pu3 jin1 si1 Da4 xue2
